name: Lacrosse Dodge
description:
Lacrosse Dodge is a high-quality, 3D lacrosse mobile video game. Featuring precision tilt gameplay and motion capture lacrosse animations, Lacrosse Dodge is the most entertaining lacrosse app on the market.

Dodge your way through defenders and crazy obstacles as you rack up points the further you can make it. Score bonus points by picking up speed bursts, sniping goals and collecting coins.

Grab your lacrosse stick and prepare to dodge anything in your path to victory! See where you can rank on the worldwide leaderboards!
